list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He threw his cigarette on the ground and trod on it.

list_definition.definition: to walk on, along, over etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He trod the streets looking for a job.

list_definition.definition: to crush by putting one’s feet on

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We watched them treading the grapes.

list_definition.definition: a way of walking or putting one’s feet
the grooved and patterned surface of a tyre/tire

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The tread has been worn away.

list_definition.definition: the horizontal part of a step or stair on which the foot is placed.
